import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {Form, Row, NavLink, Button, Container, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import {USER_ROUTE} from '../utils/consts'; const isCompany = window.localStorage.getItem('isCompany') !== null const Auth = () => { const isLogin = useLocation().pathname === USER_ROUTE + '/login' let [email, setEmail] = useState('') let [password, setPassword] = useState('') return (

{isLogin ? 'Authorization' : 'Registration'}

{!isLogin &&
{!isCompany ? : {window.localStorage.removeItem('isCompany')}
} } {!isLogin ? Authorize : Register }
); }; export default Auth;
